title: Which has the best camera quality when it comes to mobile phones, Apple or Samsung? - Quora

response.answer_text: In this case, it is a tie between Samsung and Apple with the very best being other OEMs.  What is DXOMARK? Established in 2008, DXOMARK is an independent benchmark that scientifically assesses smartphones, lenses and cameras. We currently test image quality of lenses and cameras and image as well as the audio quality of smartphones. Hundreds of individual test results for each device are combined into one score called the DXOMARK score. The result of a rigorous scientific test protocol using industry-grade lab tools, a DXOMARK score sums up our assessment of a devices’ image or audio quality. The higher the score, the better the product.
